function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of scoping reviews on the intersection of wearable technology and COVID-19","Impact":"Potential missed opportunities for understanding the effectiveness of wearable technology in mitigating COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct a comprehensive scoping review to fill the gap in the literature","Technologies":"Literature review methodologies, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate evaluation of search terms and index terms","Impact":"Risk of missing relevant studies and data sources","Mitigation":"Engage experienced science librarian to check search strategy, use electronic search strategy checklist","Technologies":"Electronic literature search tools, search strategy checklists","People":"Researchers, science librarians","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to consider language restrictions in the search strategy","Impact":"Potential exclusion of relevant studies published in languages other than English","Mitigation":"Avoid language restrictions in the search strategy","Technologies":"Multilingual database search tools","People":"Researchers, language experts","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"}]}
